Name: Ducks' Wrath
About the game: Grab some friends and get ready to have some fun! In Duck's Wrath you can face up to 3 friends in 2 different game modes based on pushing your rivals into the water by colliding or burping at them. Hot dogs will appear randomly every few seconds, you'll have to eat at least one to burp at your 'friends'. Let the best duck win! Game Features: Controller and keyboard support: You can play with up to 4 controllers or with 3 controllers and one keyboard. Basic mechanic: Win your opponents by burping at them. More food equals stronger burps! Level editor: Thanks to the included level editor, you will be able to create amazing levels in a very short amount of time, and share them with your friends!
